text: Han Mr. Senator bohut expectations rkhta hun mai apne wing walon se kya kiya jaye. Memoir toh mai expect kr rha tha but khud bhi memoirs likhne padenge yeh nhi socha tha. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ . 2 hafte hogye hain, friendly reminder nahane ke liye. Tera bed pe pura let ke padhna toh ab humare alawa 2-3 Lakh logon ko aur yaad rhega! Saath mein teri woh smile jo aati thi tab tereko pata tha ki tu kuch alag bolne wala hai! Baki Antaragni ka tereko pass toh dil wa dunga, but bhao toh koi tereko bhi nahi degi ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Cisco apka intezar kar rhi with open arms toh best of luck uske liye and contact mein rehna ! ğŸ¤™ğŸ¤™
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
One of the toughest memoirs I'd have to write will be for my brother.

One of the best wing repi, any wing could ever get. Pure wing ka common link tha Nareda. Koi bhi dikkat ho, ya kuch bhi bakchodi krni ho Nareda ke paas jane ka mann krta tha. Humari wing ka Ambani bnne ke liye Thanks, Tu na hota toh kitne get-togethers shayad ho hi nhi pati. Humari senator debate toh yaad hi hogi, jismein eventually hum dono ne apply nhi kiya and end mein senator bne Sharma ji ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 2nd year aur first year summers toh humne practically pure time saath bitayi hai. Abhi bhi yaad hai mujhe  saath baithke world cup ke matches dekhna, swimming, raat bhar patte khelna aur subah MT jake breakfast krna. ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡

Isliye itna bura bhi laga tha mujhe jab tu jaldi nikal gya. 2 din tak toh mai room se nikla bhi nhi :(:(. Ek advice agar mai dena chahun toh woh yhi hogi ki khud ko kisi bhi friendship/relationship mein itna mat invest krna ki saamne wala reciprocate hi na kar paye. (Baki Mario wala gift abhi bhi pending hai ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›!)

Jaldi se UPSC nikal lena mere aspirant par Abhilash ki tarah mujhe bhul mat jana. Thank you for being such a pleasant part of my life at IITK. One that I'll always cherish and dher saara Good luck aage ke liye bhi.ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡

Ab kuch lines mere favourite gaane se-:

It's been a long day without you, my friend
And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
We've come a long way from where we began
Oh, I'll tell you all about it when I see you again.

ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Mera neighbour aur dher sari ladaiyon mein partner Shrotriya. Bhai first year mein toh mai maha chaapu smjhta tha, par second-year aur third-year tak aate aate tum chudaap zyada krne lage the ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Patte, Mafia, Monopoly mein toh humari fixed attendance rehti thi. Mafia mein toh kya hi andhi marte the tum ğŸ˜‚. Par tum mera vishwas krlete the bas utna tha, kyunki hum dono ko mafia banne ko milta hi nhi tha ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. Woh wala game abhi bhi yaad hai jismein tumhare MTH wale dost ne hagg diya tha warna hum jeet rhe the. 

 Last month na mil pane ka mujhe khudko regret sbse zyada hai par coincidence yeh tha ki jis din nikalne ka mail aaya uss din bhi apan dehla pakad khel rhe the. First year mein jab aaye the toh tum thoda reserved,shy types the, par end tak aate toh kya chilate the bhai tum ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Teen roomm chhodke bhi awaz aa jati thi. Hall ke cult secy(jabardasti ki post thi waise) bnke tumne Galaxy toh mast krwadi par end mein ELS ke event ke liye tumhe mai hi milta tha ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Ab dusron ka toh pta nhi par tujhe toh khila hi deta tha, ab andha paisa aajayega toh tum khila dena ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ. Youngest IITian hai bhai tu humari wing ka, chaapu aaya tha aur chaapke hi jaa rha hai. Tere saath rehna mere liye khatarnaak bhi tha (___Zindabad, sariya) aur mazzedaar bhi. Best of luck tumhe bhi, dher sara cash kamao aur hume na bhul jana. Abhi bohut treats baki hain ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Mera favourite barista Deepanshu Katare! Bhai Ghar aane ke baad bohut beaten coffee pi, tab bhi tera wala flavor nhi aa paya. Wing ke sabse active logon mein se ek. Wing ka koi bhi event ho toh usmein chief guest tu hi tha. Kisi bhi situation mein logon ko entertain rkhna, yeh tera hi ek unique talent tha. Mast mast mimicry karna, daaru partyyyy, and kabhi bhi canteen ya mess akele na jana! Kitni baar hum gaye hain Hall 1 aur Hall 4 tiwary ki chai peene ğŸ¤˜ ğŸ¤˜ and woh bohut miss krunga mai. 

Ab tune notice toh kiya hoge ki itne logon se mila tu fir bhi sabpe apni chaap chhod gya. Itna special hai tu sabke liyeğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ƒ. Ab yeh vlog wala Buzinezz tumhe next reunion tak tujhe continue rkhna hai. Fir mai bhi bolunga acha katare tu jaa rha hai? Itna jaldi jaa rha hai?  Chall theek hai bhai milte rhenge ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.

PS-: I hope we get to meet at least ek baar campus mein. Nahi ho paya toh bahar mil lenge ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›!Best of luck dost!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
First year se mere dimag mein humesha ek hi sawal rha hai. 
"Kaise krlete ho yaar JD tum?"
Phy102 ke doubts hain toh JD se puch lo.
Basketball player chahiye JD se puch lo.
Baddy player chahiye JD se puch lo.
Dance mein hall ko jitana hai JD se puch lo.
Patte khelne hai JD se puch lo.

One of the first people I've met who tries everything and still manages to be amazing at every one of them. Someone you can truly depend on. It was a pleasure knowing you JD and the more I got to know you, the more I was left in awe of you :). I hope in the future you find something that can truly challenge you!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Agar kabhi karan ka room dundhna ho toh woh room dundho jiski light exam wali raat 12:30 band hogyi hai.....

Wing ki sare get-togethers, UCL ke sare matches, aur baddy and phatta ke sare games mein full attendance deke, exam wali raat 12:30 so jana and agle din paper chaapke aajana. Just a normal day in the office for Karan. 

Kaafi time saath spend kiya, kaafi time aur spend krna tha but CKMKB. Next wali trip pe pakka saath mein jayenge. IITK get together toh chlta rhega. Wahan pe I can learn all your newly acquired flirting skills. 

All the best bolta magar JP morgan hai, mujhe pata hai acha hi hoga bc ! TAJ Hotel mein booking rkhna bas!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Loki mere bhai, tera aur mera first year kaisa ek sa beeta tha. Hum dono ke palle kuch padhta nhi tha aur dono ne hi TG ko bhagwan maan liya tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Abhi bhi yaad hai ki apne sare bhiayon mein mere hi Phy102 mein sabse kam the ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. 2nd-3rd year mein apna constant interaction chalte rehta tha, tu aata tha mujhse puchne koi mast movie/tv series btaun(Abhi bhi puchta hai). Sach bolun toh apne saare bhaiyon mein ek tu hi tha jisne mere kabhi mazze nhi liye. Dhanyawad apka ğŸ˜…. Aur maine jitne bhi random shows suggest kre, tune eventually sab ko ek baar try toh kiya(Aur end ein pasand bhi kiye xD). 

Mai agar Tommy hun toh tu mera Arhur hai. 
"First a few words from the heart. My brother helped me survive through some of the worst times." 
Yeh wala dialogue yaad aajata hai mujhe!

Loki ko dekhke ek calm si feeling aati thi, tujhse araam se kuchbhi share kr skta tha mai. Hn woh ek baar angry young man wala loki bhi dekha tha jab woh photo daal di thi tushank ne ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Tu contact mein rehna Loki mai naye shows dekhke rkhunga tere liye! Aur dher saara best of luck, jo bhi karna, jaisa bhi krna, wahi krna jismein tera dil lage ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„. Aur haan play mein teri acting mast thi bhai ekdum <3 aur tu likhta bhi mast hai!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hmm Ostwal Kaisa hai mere dost? Sach bolun toh apne college ka full experience tune uthaya hai, tera passion jo that usmein bhi tune pura time diya and jab career ki baat ayi toh tu usmein bhi full lag gya. Thank you for convincing me and countless others to play their part in the galaxy journey, tera galaxy ko leke jo passion tha ussi ke karan apne hall ne 2nd year mein izzat aur 3rd year mein shikhar jamayi. Mai shi mein kabhi mime nhi krta agar tu na hota. ğŸ™‚ğŸ™‚

Baki tera character development toh kya movie ki tarah tha. First year mein jo jo cheesein pasand nhi thi eventually tune woh sab kiya ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Mujhe abhi bhi yaad hai first year mein raat ke teen bje tu rochak aur yogi aaye the NCL se midsems ke ek din pehle aur bathroom mein baal bna rhe the. Aur mai toh sahi mein expect kr rha tha ki tum practice se aa rhe ho ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. 

Tumhare commitment and dedication apne club and hall ke prati ko full marks. Accha ab chalta hun HiLabs mein yaad rkhna! Dher saare notes chaapna aur connected rehna!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Jab itni chapu bio likhi ho toh memoir likhna toh Banta hai!
Toh sabse pehle mujhe Techkriti mein bulane ke liye shukriya, pure teen hafte shiddat se kaam kiya maine fest ke liye jo kabhi hua hi nhi ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. It made me realise ki kaafi fursat aur mehnat wala kaam hota hai yeh ğŸ˜…. You were missed in campus bhai, jab hum sabne decide kiya ki thoda nashe krenge tu sanyas leke baith gya ğŸ™ğŸ™. Next BSBE gang ka reunion miss mat krna, abhi bohut funnn baki hai !
And jeb dheeli karne ke liye ready rehna, the treat's gonna be funded by you and Priyal ! And contact mein rehna bhai yaad se!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hey bro! Today's finally the day I write your memoir! Toh ek Cheese burst pizza zarur bhijwa dena ghar pe ğŸ¤£. I think across these four years, you are one of the people who's changed so much. I suppose you yourself and the people around you would agree to that! But to me personally, I've always seen you as this confident and interactive person who's forever eager to know people and keep the social circle together and brimming with activity.  And this is one quality that has probably stayed with you until today. Although, I will admit you can be borderline rude and rather annoying kabhi kabhi but I guess that's the Delhiite in you that takes over ğŸ˜›. I do believe that your efforts and help can go under the radar sometimes, so a cumulative Thank you for that! ğŸ˜… 

I hope you keep persevering, keep running, and kudos to what you've already achieved so far and lots more to come.  And please, for God's sake, decide on a career choice, will you? Now, I won't say the customary stay in touch remark because I'm certain we will!ğŸ¤˜
author: Yatin  Azad

And tumhare dancing skills toh ekdum mazzedaar theğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹! Par bhai kabhi bhi so jana and bina chaddar bichaye so jana aur naak se woh ajeeb si awazein nikalna ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Ek fact jo shayad waise kisi aur ne point nhi kiya hoga and woh hai tumhara gadget ka collection. Baap re! Ek do idhar bhi bhijwa do ab toh tum 1 percenter ho gye. ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ . Aur tumhare Tv series niptane ke skills se toh mai aaj bhi surprised rehta hun. 8-9 season wale shows bhi tum toh hafte mein nipta dete the  ğŸ¥´ğŸ¥´.

Wing ke OG Bihari boy ko dher sara best of luck! Agar logon ke saath bhi review system hota toh tumhe pure 4.5/5 deta mai. 0.5 minus for cleanliness ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Stay connected buddy humesha!

author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hi Somu! Most of this post would be a big Thank you from me to you, so pehle hi heads up! Sach kahun toh during the initial phase of my college I had no idea how I would survive here. First sem toh bura gya hi tha and second sem mein bhi kuch smjh nhi aa rha tha. Uss samay mera inspiration to tha! jitna shiddat se tu TA ka kaam krta tha and jitne dedication se tu padhta tha, it made me realise that If I wanted to achieve something, I'll have to work hard for it! But what was even more admirable was the way you always stuck by your principles right until the end. Final kuch samay ke liye bhi tu college nhi aaya, iske liye dher sari gaaliyan dene ka mann toh kiya; but thoda sa dil main relief bhi tha kyunki chaar saal baad bhi Somu remained the Somu we all knew and loved. 

Iss baar maaf toh krdiya hai but next time koi excuses nhi challenge :P . Bade officer ban jao fir ek mast trip pe challenge! Tab take ke liye dher sara Good Luck! And Thank you for always being an ever dependable friend and such an amazing human being. Lots of love to you, keep in touch :)
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Han bro hum logon ko ab pata hai. Ki BSBE gang ka sabse talented banda tu hi hai. Cool Dude 69## naam hi kaafi hai ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. 3rd year mein kya mast trio bana tha hum logon ka, kehne ko exams chal rhe the but sabse zyada mazze bhi maine tabhi kiye. TA201 toh yaad hi hoga, best project tha apna ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. Fir dheere dheere jab third year end hua toh mai hi bacha trio mein akelağŸ˜’ğŸ˜’. 

Mast magai krke pokemon ke episodes dekhne mein kya hi mazza aata tha ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡. Par BC tune promise kiya tha dance sikhayega, ab hopefully mai toh campus mein hi hun toh aate rhunga milne. Tu bhi fatafat job lagwale fir trip pe bhi jana hai(Stud bnne ke tips and tricks bhi sikhane hai tujhe mujhe.)  Online humari chhoti moti ho jati hai ladai, but offline its always fun with you and I know it'll remain that way! Best of luck bhai, machate rehna humesha, naachte rehna humesha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚!

text:
Aur Vishesh, apne Bhaiyon mein lagta apan dono hi hain jo ek saal aur saath rhenge ğŸ˜… ğŸ˜…. Ek mahina extra hota agar aap apna slot acche se chunte. ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒAb yeh bhi nhi pata ki iss saal college jane ko bhi milega ya nhi isliye yhi sab likh deta hun.

Sabse pehle toh kya dushmani hai bhai tumhari humari branch se ? Tumne sab branches mein apna haath mar liya, humari wali reh gyi bas. Dual major BSBE mein krna tha, kaafi scope hai ğŸ¤£. 
Hum dono ke kaafi common interests rhe hain RCB, King Kohli and Abki baar.... sarkar. Aur teenon ne hi hume kya disappoint kiya hai. ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”

Isliye sabse zyada gaaliyan bhi ab hum hi log dete hain unhe. Badminton mein humari partnership badhiya thi bhai, sirf tu hi tha jiske saath mai nhi haarta tha ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£.(Although tere liye shaayad woh partnership utni sahi na ho kyunki zyada mehnta krni padti thi tereko xD). Kaafi miss kiya tujhe iss baar court mein, JD ka koi competitor hi nhi tha! 

Even though tu chill thoda kam hi marta hai but I'm happy ki jab bhi hum phatta, volley ya baddy ke liye nikalte the, you were always there. Aur jo tera yeh angry young man hone ke karan woh jhagde ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.

4(3) saal mein itna confidence toh aagya tha ki VK hai bada chaapu! Mai Virat Kohli ki baat kr rha hun saale(Ab yeh mat bolna gaali kisko diya bey). Waise tujhe bhi zarurat toh nhi hai luck ki but fir bhi Best of Luck for your future endeavours. It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope I can continue meeting you! Humari family mein sabse zyada toh tune hi machaya hai but fir bhi agar kabhi bhi zarurat lage toh I'll be there for you humeshağŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Yogi Man! Mai yeh memoir likh rha hun iss ummed mein ki tere woh 21 din khatm nhi huye hain, taki tu yeh memoir padh paye. Baki sab side pe rkhke sabse pehle-: Nashe chhod de mere bhai ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. First year mein aaye the tab tu hi ek experienced banda tha aur end tak aate toh bhai tune sabko try karwa diya ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. But ek jo sabse acchi baat lagi tujhmein woh yeh thi ki tu kabhi bhi kuch khaa, pee raha ho tu sabse pehle dusron ko include krne ka try krta tha. Jaise mai room mein ghuson tu bolta tha "Aja baithja khaale." 
Bhai gaming laptop toh le liya tune, uspe game koi bhi nhi kheli tune ajtak ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ aur kharab pehle karwa diya. 
Aur tumhara paper wali raat NCL jake CID, Savdhan India dekhna toh pure campus mein famous hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bhai mai toh keh rha hun abhi bhi Cricket Sir se summer camp ka refund mangle, kyunki fatta toh tu pehle jaisa khelta tha, camp ke baad bhi waise hi khelta tha ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. Bhai dil ka ekdum mast hai tu bas Nashe aur CID chhod de, sab shi ho jayega. Thoda toh fefdon ko bachana hai na nhi toh aage jake kaise khelnge apan? Take care bhai ğŸ˜„
